title: ici
author: ici
content: We have a software solution for token projects who want to empower their community with DeFi features such as- dexes- stakingWe are looking for a marketing lead / manager with experience in outreaching to projects and bringing in quality leads.You will be responsible for- managing $30k that you will fully account for - participate in business decisions of marketing - do daily tasks such as speaking to potential clients, b2b emails, calls, etc. (8h / day) Benefits5% of the token supply wage based on how much volume you bring (10% of all services)as the token will have a marketing tax, you will also get 20% of it in BNB and 60% in tokens depending on performancepossibility to progress to $100k/year in basic salary + bonuses if you meet volume criteriaYour experienceWe are looking for someone who has done this before, who has managed projects in the past or at least has had a community manager role withcrypto projects. You MUST be somewhat familiar with EVM chains (binance smart chain, ethereum, polygon). Shall you decide to proceed, leave a reply here or reach out to https://t.me/@Airdropdude on Telegram You may send your CV in PDF format to the telegram account

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: Your username can't be found. Telegram me on : @Seveniusmarketing
